planner codes in master scheduling
planner codes master list of Planner Codes
section.para: Planner Codes are used to identify Items that fall under the jurisdiction of planners codes for planners—that is, employees responsible for planning, scheduling, or procurement. To access the master list of Planner Codes, select the "Planner Codes" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Planner Codes" screen displays information on all existing Planner Codes, including Planner Code and Planner Code description.
